name: Prizzy and Orb
description:
In a corner of space and a fraction of time,
shape people live, on blocks in a line.

Prizzy was a pyramid, most thigs he didn't care,
orb was a sphere just happy to be there.
They spend their time gem collecting,
moving tiles in the right direction.

But when one shifts one way, a tile shifts another-
Unbeknownst to them, they annoy the other.

Prizzy and Orb is a local 2 player turn-based puzzle game
